GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
drm/msm/mdp5: Return error code in mdp5_pipe_release when deadlock is detected

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 04bef5f1ba8ea6d7c1c8f5f65e0395c62db59cb8, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit 7907a0d77cb461f58045763c205a5830be72e97c. For more details please see the references link.
